stepWelcome.title: Beautiful you are a part of DumondaMe
stepWelcome.description: To make getting started as easy as possible, you can make the most important settings for your account below.

stepProfileImage.title: Your Profile Picture
stepProfileImage.description: Select your profile picture. In the privacy settings you can determine who is allowed to see it.

stepTopics.title: Topics
stepTopics.description: Which topics are you interested in?

stepQuestion.description: Questions are the heart of DumondaMe. These can be answered with different answer types like:
stepQuestion.hint: Tip! You can also answer your own question.

stepCommitment.description: Commitments at DumondaMe are the possibility to present your club, your company, your project or your personal commitment for a bright future of the world.
stepCommitment.hint: Tip! Engagements can also be used as an answer to a question.

stepTrustCircle.description: What information we believe has a lot to do with trust. Add people whose opinion you value to your Trust Circle. By activating the Trust Circle filter, you will see in your feed when these people capture a question, answer questions, agree to answers, and more.
